attributes.action: Do NOT hold a referendum on the final Brexit deal.
attributes.additional_details: Regardless of whether individuals voted to remain or leave the EU in the June 2016 EU referendum, the result has now been declared and everyone - regardless of party political affiliation - should support our Government in its attempt to secure the best possible deal for both the UK and EU.  Another referendum is entirely unnecessary and would only serve to further division and uncertainty, benefiting no-one.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call upon HM Government to ensure that Parliament is given the final say on the Brexit deal negotiated by the UK and EU and that NO FURTHER REFERENDUM takes place.
